org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.dao

Class TokenMgtDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.dao.TokenMgtDAO
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class TokenMgtDAO
extends Object
    Data Access Layer functionality for Token management in OAuth 2.0 implementation. This includes storing and retrieving access tokens, authorization codes and refresh tokens.

      • invalidateAndCreateNewToken

        public void invalidateAndCreateNewToken(String oldAccessTokenId,
                                        String tokenState,
                                        String consumerKey,
                                        String tokenStateId,
                                        AccessTokenDO accessTokenDO,
                                        String userStoreDomain)
                                 throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Deprecated. 
        This method is used invalidate the existing token and generate a new toke within one DB transaction.
        Parameters:
        oldAccessTokenId - access token need to be updated.
        tokenState - token state before generating new token.
        consumerKey - consumer key of the existing token
        tokenStateId - new token state id to be updated
        accessTokenDO - new access token details
        userStoreDomain - user store domain which is related to this consumer
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
